sentences.en: Especially, outdoor cooking ( Pizza Baking, Roast with Dutch Oven ), Canue, kayak are very fun.
sentences.cn: 尤其是野炊 ( 烤披萨,用荷式烤法 ), 滑独木舟,搭小艇真的好好玩喔!

sentences.en: Fight the rapids as you kayak and raft down the vast Mekong River.
sentences.cn: 当你的皮船和木筏冲进湄公河时和急流的艰险战斗.

sentences.en: How can I tell a canoe from a kayak?
sentences.cn: 皮艇和划艇该怎么区分 呢 ?

sentences.en: Kayak can also find you a terrific deal on airfare to Las Vegas.
sentences.cn: 独木舟能也在票价上发现你极好的买卖到拉斯维加斯.

sentences.en: Mike: Yes, he can. He can kayak very well.
sentences.cn: 迈克: 不, 他能的. 他划独木舟很拿手.

sentences.en: Run, bike, swim, surf, kayak and more. Got what it takes?
sentences.cn: 跑, 自行车, 游泳, 波浪, 独木舟和更多. 得到了它拿的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Sarah Cox and her kayak got stuck against the rock and raging rapids.
sentences.cn: 萨拉?考克斯在驾驶皮艇时,被岩石和汹涌的急流卡住.

sentences.en: The area can be seen by car, bike, canoe, kayak or on foot.
sentences.cn: 你可以开小车, 骑自行车, 划独木舟, 皮船或者徒步欣赏这里.

sentences.en: The kayak is propelled by kayakers in a sitting position.
sentences.cn: 皮艇则是由皮艇桨手用坐姿划行的.

sentences.en: The video footage apparently showed the shark circling Kulcsar after bumping him off his kayak.
sentences.cn: 这段录像明显地记录了卡尔克撒从皮划艇上跌落后被鲨鱼盘旋追逐的情景.

sentences.en: We did some really fun kayak in after that.
sentences.cn: 骑完车,我们去冲浪,真的很有趣.

sentences.en: Well, it's a special technique we use to get the kayak upright when it overturns.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 那是独木舟翻覆时所用的一种使独木舟翻正的特殊技巧.
如果独木舟翻过来怎么办?

sentences.en: Woman kayak a total of 11 gold medals, the Soviet Union team claimed seven.
sentences.cn: 女子皮艇共11块金牌, 苏联队夺去7块.
